name: leaf-guard

effect.sun_moon: rest works as usual during strong sunlight.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: rest works as usual during strong sunlight.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: rest works as usual during strong sunlight.

short_effect: Protects against major status ailments during strong sunlight.

flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.
